verbose_text: Upon activation, the IRS proteins can be phosphorylated and transmit signals from the IGF1 and insulin receptors to several Src homology 2 (SH2) domain containing proteins, such as PI3K and GRB2, triggering the activation of the PI3K / AKT and MAPK / ERK signaling pathways, respectively XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: IRS proteins can be phosphorylated and transmit signals from the IGF1 and insulin receptors to several Src homology 2 (SH2) domain
